Title: The Riddle of the Sphinx: Egypt's Ancient Guardian
Description: Unearth the secrets of the Great Sphinx of Giza, an iconic symbol of ancient Egypt shrouded in mystery. Explore its historical significance, the mysteries of its origin, and the debates about its purpose. #HistoricalMysteries #Sphinx #Egyptology #AncientEgypt

Scenes.VoiceOverText: The Great Sphinx of Giza, a monumental sculpture, has gazed upon the Egyptian desert for thousands of years.
Scenes.Description: A panoramic view of the Sphinx with the Pyramids in the background, highlighting its majestic presence.
Scenes.Text: The Great Sphinx of Giza a monumental sculpture has gazed upon the Egyptian desert for thousands of years
